ModMetaData.name: ZoneInspectData
ModMetaData.author: Varisha
ModMetaData.description:
This mod will put some basic information into the inspect window for the current selected zone.
Feature: This mod will put some basic information into the inspect window for the current selected zone.
The mod analyzes the stored items in a zone and performs some magic. It adds a scrollable list of entries into the inspect window if a zone is selected. The default handling for other selections is not touched! The list contains an icon, the label and the total number of things in the zone.
ToDo: - alphabetical sorting of entries - dynamic height of inspect window for larger lists - include currently excluded entries (things without icon will be placed at the end of the list)
Version: 1.0.17.2
